snippet: The Moreland Commission decided to look into how political parties use loosely regulated fund-raising accounts, known as housekeeping committees.
abstract: Commission to Investigate Public Corruption agrees to issue subpoena to New York State Democratic Party; also decides to look into how political parties use loosely regulated fund-raising accounts, known as housekeeping committees.
lead_paragraph: The Moreland Commission decided to look into how political parties use loosely regulated fund-raising accounts, known as housekeeping committees.

headline.main: Panel to Investigate State Democratic Party
headline.print_headline: Panel to Investigate State Democratic Party

keywords.value: Moreland Commission to Investigate Public Corruption (NYS)
